name: Italian Pesto Pizza
author: Skipper
summary: This pizza will knock your socks off! Trust me, there will be no leftovers. Pesto comes together with other savory ingredients to make a killer pizza pie!
ingredients: 6 ounces marinated fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Roll out pizza dough as directed on package
Spread the pesto evenly on the crust
Arrange mozzarella slices over the pesto; scatter prosciutto over the mozzarella
Sprinkle pizza with the fresh parsley, fresh basil, and grated Parmesan
Bake in preheated oven, until crust is browned and pizza is hot and bubbly, about 10 minutes
